imdb.plot outline: The Toronto Film Race television series is a compilation of the best short films produced for the Toronto Film Race event held each year in Toronto. Each team is given a theme and a prop to incorporate into the short film and 24hours to produce it. The films are then screened at the Bloor Cinema in downtown Toronto and judged for cash and prizes. Film Racing is a series of North American based events taking place in over 20 US and Canadian cities.
imdb.title: Toronto Film Race
plot: The _Toronto Film Race_ (qv) television series is a compilation of the best short films produced for the _Toronto Film Race_ (qv) event held each year in Toronto. Each team is given a theme and a prop to incorporate into the short film and 24hours to produce it. The films are then screened at the Bloor Cinema in downtown Toronto and judged for cash and prizes. Film Racing is a series of North American based events taking place in over 20 US and Canadian cities.::Rob Tosh
